message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it will be of great value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob, but the product's value is truly worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm still not convinced that $90 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $85, so how about $87.50?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $87.50 is close, but I need to get at least $89 for it to make sense for me. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not willing to go above $87.50. Can you meet me at that price?
